newsitem.title: FRANCE: France sells 20.86 bln Ffr OATs at auction.
newsitem.headline: France sells 20.86 bln Ffr OATs at auction.

text.p: The Treasury sold the following government bonds (OATs) at auction on Thursday.
MATURITY COUPON SALE AMOUNT AVERAGE YIELD
BID AMT/COVER NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE
PCT ALLOTED AT LOWEST PRICE* PAYMENT DATE
* PRICES ABOVE GOT ALLOTMENTS IN FULL NEXT AUCTION
MATURITY COUPON SALE AMOUNT AVERAGE YIELD
BID AMT/COVER NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE
PCT ALLOTED AT LOWEST PRICE* PAYMENT DATE
* PRICES ABOVE GOT ALLOTMENTS IN FULL NEXT OFFER

NOTE - The Treasury originally announced it would sell 20 to 22 billion francs of OATs today with the TEC 10 making up between four and six billion of the overall total. The total bid cover ratio of the auction was 1.6.
